name: UIListContentConfiguration
desc: A content configuration for a list-based content view.

items.name: static func cell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in a list.

items.name: static func subtitleCell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell that’s in a list and contains subtitle text.

items.name: static func valueCell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell that’s in a list and contains side-by-side value text.

items.name: static func sidebarCell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in a sidebar list.

items.name: static func sidebarSubtitleCell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell that’s in a sidebar list and contains subtitle text.

items.name: static func accompaniedSidebarCell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell in an accompanied sidebar list.

items.name: static func accompaniedSidebarSubtitleCell() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a cell that’s in an accompanied sidebar list and contains subtitle text.

items.name: static func plainHeader() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a header in a plain list.

items.name: static func plainFooter() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a footer in a plain list.

items.name: static func groupedHeader() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a header in a grouped list.

items.name: static func groupedFooter() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a footer in a grouped list.

items.name: static func prominentInsetGroupedHeader() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a prominent header in an inset grouped list.

items.name: static func extraProminentInsetGroupedHeader() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style an extra prominent header in an inset grouped list.

items.name: static func sidebarHeader() -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Creates the default configuration you use to style a header in a sidebar list.

items.name: var image: UIImage?
items.desc: The image to display.

items.name: var text: String?
items.desc: The primary text.

items.name: var attributedText: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: An attributed variant of the primary text.

items.name: var secondaryText: String?
items.desc: The secondary text.

items.name: var secondaryAttributedText: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: An attributed variant of the secondary text.

items.name: var imageProperties: UIListContentConfiguration.ImageProperties
items.desc: Properties for configuring the image.

items.name: var textProperties: UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties
items.desc: Properties for configuring the primary text.

items.name: var secondaryTextProperties: UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties
items.desc: Properties for configuring the secondary text.

items.name: struct UIListContentConfiguration.ImageProperties
items.desc: Properties that affect the list content configuration’s image.

items.name: struct UIListContentConfiguration.TextProperties
items.desc: Properties that affect the list content configuration’s text.

items.name: var axesPreservingSuperviewLayoutMargins: UIAxis
items.desc: A Boolean value that detemines whether the content view preserves the layout margins that it inherits from its superview on the horizontal or vertical axes.

items.name: var directionalLayoutMargins: NSDirectionalEdgeInsets
items.desc: The margins between the content and the edges of the content view.

items.name: var prefersSideBySideTextAndSecondaryText: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that detemines whether the configuration positions the text and secondary text side by side.

items.name: var imageToTextPadding: CGFloat
items.desc: The padding between the image and text.

items.name: var textToSecondaryTextHorizontalPadding: CGFloat
items.desc: The minimum horizontal padding between the text and secondary text.

items.name: var textToSecondaryTextVerticalPadding: CGFloat
items.desc: The vertical padding between the text and secondary text.

items.name: func makeContentView() -> UIView & UIContentView
items.desc: Creates a new instance of the content view using the configuration.

items.name: func updated(for: UIConfigurationState) -> UIListContentConfiguration
items.desc: Generates a configuration for the specified state by applying the configuration’s default values for that state to any properties that you don't customize.

items.name: static func == (UIListContentConfiguration, UIListContentConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two list content configurations are equal.

items.name: static func != (UIListContentConfiguration, UIListContentConfiguration) -> Bool
items.desc: An operator for checking whether two list content configurations are unequal.

items.name: func hash(into: inout Hasher)
items.desc: Hashes the essential components of the list content configuration by feeding them into the hasher.

items.name: var hashValue: Int
items.desc: The hash value.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A textual representation of the instance.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A textual representation of the instance, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var customMirror: Mirror
items.desc: The custom mirror for the instance.
